resources.string: In the Settings activity some available configurations for this app are desplayed: Equalizer, Notifications, Sync Settings across devices, Library location etc. I need to use SharedPreferences, Equalizer, Storage Access and possible others API.
This is the Store of the App from where the user can browse an online store to purchase music. Setting up this activity will require WebView and Storage Access.
This is the NowP laying section of the App. From this activity the user can control the song playback. In order to fully implement this activity, I can use the MediaPlayer API.
This is the main activity of the App. From this activity the user can navigate through the app in a consistent way. Other activities are started using explicit intents.
This is the Library that displays the available list of songs from the internal memory of the device. In order to implement this I need to use the Storage Access Framework.
